attributes.action: Consider that just as the Labour Party enforced fair representation for women in its selection of parliamentary candidates in 1997, I petition that Cabinet Posts in the Government should be allocated in proportion to their nationalities and the country that their constituency lies within. This would result in England having fair represantation in Government and not being ruled by a cadre of Scottish MP's who give unfair subsidies and tax breaks to the provinces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
